about_the_game:
3rd person survival-sneaking and story-driven AITTA will bring
you the forgotten stories from the deep Scandinavian forests.

The main characters in distress, each carrying a heavy past will face their
limits of Sisu (The Finnish courage) when their lives collide with the ruthless concepts from an ancient book.

In AITTA, you’ll experience these rare tales that can no longer be found even on the dustiest shelves of antiquarian bookshops. The game features two parallel storylines: the Main Story and Episodes. The Episodes draw inspiration from old Finnish folktales, and your choices in these side stories will impact your progress in the Main Story.

content_descriptors.notes:
In this game you get to experience the old Finnish folk stories as they were originally written. Like in the Grimms' Fairy Tales, some are brutal and outspoken. Among the fantasy and adventures, there are hints of harsh language, violence and sexuality. 

None of the stories include any kind of negative depiction or mistreatment of certain people or cultures. Even though we Finns can sometimes laugh at ourselves.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700 Eight-Core Processor, 3200 Mhz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700 Eight-Core Processor, 3200 Mhz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Explore and experience the old, lost Finnish folk stories.
